title: Water Sports Experience With Four Activities for £29 at Lochearnhead Water Sports Centre (£73 Value)
highlights:
• Accessible from Glasgow, Edinburgh and Dundee
  • Four varied activities: zorbing, banana boating, bucking bronco and kayaking
  • Two hour experience
  • Suitable for adults and children
